text: Thomas Gamiette (born 21 June 1986) is a Guadeloupe international footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Championnat National 2 side FC Fleury 91. He previously played in Ligue 2 for Reims, Tours, Paris FC and Bourg-en- Bresse, and in the Thai Premier League for BEC Tero Sasana. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Guadeloupe's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" !
